title: Yvonne Goes to York
description: The shy Miss Yvonne Grenier, a beautiful fugitive of the French Revolution, is quite terrified when a dangerous enemy boards her stage to York. Luckily, Miss Hannah Pym is also on board. Ever the matchmaker, Miss Pym sees the answer to Yvonne s plight in the hands and heart of another passenger the Marquis of Ware. Handsome and tailored to perfection, the marquis birth and fortune are armor enough to defend Yvonne. Although the girl is of the French bourgeoisie and below him, Miss Pym is certain that Yvonne s Gallic graces and quick-witted tongue have more than piqued his interest. Miss Pym will propose a plan that enlists the Marquis aid and soon he will be proposing! After all, a maiden in distress is irresistible even to a confirmed bachelor!"
author: Marion Chesney
